column1: Where is the pain the worst?
column2: In the back, above the waistline or higher (back dominant).
In the butt or legs (leg dominant).

column1: Is the pain constant? Does it ever stop, even for a moment?
column2: The pain never stops, it is always present (constant).
There are times when the pain does vanish completely (intermittent).

column1: Does the pain get worse when bending forward or backward?
column2: The pain is at its worst when bending forward.
The pain is at its worst when bending backward.
The pain feels about the same with any sort of movement.

column1: Does the pain get worse when sitting or standing?
column2: The pain is always worsened by sitting.
The pain is always worsened by standing or walking around.
